title: Rangu Rangammaa Song Lyrics Bheema
stanzas:
Rangu Rangammaa Song Lyrics Bheema
#VijayYesudas #KailasKher #Swarnalatha

Rangu rangammaa
ratham oorum thangammaa
thangu thangammaa
naan retta suzhi aalammaa (2)

aayirathil oruthi
aasayathaan koluthi
paavi nenja niruthi
kondu poraa kadathi

ye vaththi kuchi
kannadichi vanga kadal
pathikichu.

thonga ye thonga
adaraa vishilu
singaa ye singaa
ada kizhiyum sevulu.

Rangu rangammaa
ratham oorum thangammaa
thangu thangammaa
naan retta suzhi aalammaa

Rangaa rangaiyyaa
ratham oorum thangamyaa
thangu thangaiyaa
ini neeyo naano paaraiyaa

kannukkul kaththi kappal
nenjathil retta kappal
modhinaa yuththa kappal
ivathaane.

mundhaana paaimarame
mulusaana nangurame
sariyaana maalumiyum
naanthaane.

sarakke varudhu
sarukki viludhu
ye oththu nee oththu
iva oththukittaa oarangattu.

Rangu rangammaa
ratham oorum thangammaa
thangu thangammaa
naan retta suzhi aalammaa

ada Rangaa rangaiyyaa
ratham oorum thangamyaa
thangu thangaiyaa
ini neeyo naano paaraiyaa

kaaththukku route irukkaa
kadalukku poottirukkaa
vaa machaan vazhkayila
vilayaadu.

aadaatha aattamellaam
aadathaan naam porandhom
aanandha pattaikku
vazhithaedu.

maname adangu
marunaal thodangu
ye vaada nee vaadaa
nam sandhosam goli sodaa.

Rangu rangammaa
ratham oorum thangammaa
thangu thangammaa
naan retta suzhi aalammaa

ada Rangaa rangaiyyaa
ratham oorum thangamyaa
thangu thangaiyaa
ini neeyo naano paaraiyaa

aayirathil oruthi
aasayathaan koluthi
paavi nenja niruthi
kondu poraa kadathi

ye vaththi kuchi
kannadichi vanga kadal
pathikichu.

thonga ye thonga
ne adaraa vishilu
singaa ye singaa
ada kizhiyum sevul (2)
